member.name: T:GCS.Framework.Badging.IdProducer.idProducerAPI
member.summary: Wrapper class for idProducer JSON API calls

member.name: F:GCS.Framework.Badging.IdProducer.idProducerAPI.RequestStateMapping.RequestInitState
member.summary: Request is being sent out but is not created yet.

member.name: F:GCS.Framework.Badging.IdProducer.idProducerAPI.RequestStateMapping.RequestCreated
member.summary: Request has been created.

member.name: F:GCS.Framework.Badging.IdProducer.idProducerAPI.RequestStateMapping.RequestUnassigned
member.summary: Request has been unassigned.

member.name: F:GCS.Framework.Badging.IdProducer.idProducerAPI.RequestStateMapping.RequestAssigned
member.summary: Request has been assigned (at least to a Print Dispatcher station).

member.name: F:GCS.Framework.Badging.IdProducer.idProducerAPI.RequestStateMapping.RequestAutoAssigned
member.summary: Request has been auto-assigned (from an direct print request).

member.name: F:GCS.Framework.Badging.IdProducer.idProducerAPI.RequestStateMapping.RequestReadyToPrint
member.summary: Request is ready to be printed.

member.name: F:GCS.Framework.Badging.IdProducer.idProducerAPI.RequestStateMapping.RequestPrinting
member.summary: Request is being printed.

member.name: F:GCS.Framework.Badging.IdProducer.idProducerAPI.RequestStateMapping.RequestError
member.summary: Request has errors (resulting from a print failure or other).

member.name: F:GCS.Framework.Badging.IdProducer.idProducerAPI.RequestStateMapping.RequestPrinted
member.summary: Request has been printed without any error.

member.name: F:GCS.Framework.Badging.IdProducer.idProducerAPI.RequestStateMapping.RequestQAFailed
member.summary: Request has been rejected by QA.

member.name: F:GCS.Framework.Badging.IdProducer.idProducerAPI.RequestStateMapping.RequestOnHold
member.summary: Request has been put on hold.

member.name: F:GCS.Framework.Badging.IdProducer.idProducerAPI.RequestStateMapping.RequestQAed
member.summary: Request has been QAed successfully.

member.name: F:GCS.Framework.Badging.IdProducer.idProducerAPI.RequestStateMapping.RequestClosed
member.summary: Request has been closed.

member.name: F:GCS.Framework.Badging.IdProducer.idProducerAPI.RequestStateMapping.UnknownState
member.summary: Request is in an unknown state (i.e. bad).
